title: Sunrise over South Africa
creator_credit: Grainger Maynard, Maynard, Seven Network Limited (Australia) and Greg Grainger
brief_description: A description of the people, wildlife, political climate and tourist attractions of post-apartheid (1992) South Africa. Covering the whole spectrum of life in this highly controversial country, this video ends with a message of great hope from a myriad of people of all races.
creator_credit_for_label: Grainger Maynard, Maynard, Seven Network Limited (Australia) and Greg Grainger
